565770.name: Broken Sword 2: Soundtrack
565770.description:
Broken Sword 2 - the Smoking Mirror's stunning soundtrack, featuring music from world-acclaimed composer, Barrington Pheloung.

Track List
  • 01 - Broken Sword
  • 02 - Overture
  • 03 - Mystery
  • 04 - Karzac
  • 05 - Dockside Escape
  • 06 - Quaramonte
  • 07 - Gratiano
  • 08 - The Priest
  • 09 - Emily
  • 10 - The Legend of Ketch
  • 11 - Underground
  • 12 - Enter the Jungle
  • 13 - The Stones
  • 14 - The Ancients
  • 15 - Tezcatlipoca
  • 16 - Happiness is an Inside Job
